name: Ballance Up
description:
Ballance Up - A Challenging and Addictive 2D Game for All Ages! 

Keep the ball rolling and reach the finishing spot by balancing it on a plank. With intuitive controls, use keyboard and mouse to control the board's inclination, and move it up and down to slip through the obstacles.

Dodge the obstacles and collect coins to unlock new levels and ball skins. With many intense levels that require high concentration, staying on the plank and reaching the finish line won't be an easy task. But the more you play, the easier it becomes to keep the balance and avoid falling.

Use the link below and try this game also on Google Play Store.
